headline.main: DOCKED LIGHTER SINKS IN HUDSON; Crew of 4 Gets Ashore Before Unexplained Leak Sends the City of Yonkers Down FIREBOAT'S AID UNAVAILING Much of Cargo of Smoked Rubber Is Salvaged as Cases Float to the Surface

docs.snippet: HAVANA, July 24--Out of the fog of generalities, platitudes and daily communiques handed to the press at the American Foreign Ministers' conference headquarters, a vague outline of the final result is beginning to be discernible as the parley reaches...
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVANA, July 24--Out of the fog of generalities, platitudes and daily communiques handed to the press at the American Foreign Ministers' conference headquarters, a vague outline of the final result is beginning to be discernible as the parley reaches the half-way mark today.

docs.snippet: Leopold Stokowski and his AllAmerican Youth Orchestra made their appearance last night at the Lewisohn Stadium, and they created a remarkable impression. It was the orchestra's first visit to New York.
docs.lead_paragraph: Leopold Stokowski and his AllAmerican Youth Orchestra made their appearance last night at the Lewisohn Stadium, and they created a remarkable impression. It was the orchestra's first visit to New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: Because of rain, the final concert scheduled by Leopold Stokowski and his All-American Youth Orchestra prior to their departure for Latin America could not be given at Lewisohn Stadium as intended, but was presented, instead, in the Great Hall of City College.
